# B. Programming in R

## B.1 Help
```{r}
# Getting information about a known function
?mean
help(mean)

# Searching for an in-built function
help.search("mean")
apropos("mean")

# Searching for "outside" functions 
RSiteSearch("violin",restrict=c("functions"))

```
